name: Beaming Stingray: Kickstarter Demo
description:
Experience Soraya's journey to return a captured deity in this approachable and fluid shoot 'em up. Shoot, dash, and rewind as you fight for the future by saving the past...

Features:

  • Rewind time and cooperate with past versions of yourself to overcome enemies and bosses.
  • Shoot, dash and back dash in a unique, fluid move-set.
  • Great for shoot 'em up newcomers!
  • Controllers should be supported on Windows

This alpha demo includes a solid look into the mechanics, sounds, and feel of what a full release would look like. Please know that all mechanics, art, etc. is subject to change! 

JOIN THE DISCORD!

SUPPORT THE KICKSTARTER!

WISHLIST ON STEAM!
